body:
Comment 4: 
Just tested in a Mac OS 10.5.8, and it didn't work:

$ cat a.go
package main

import (
    "fmt"
)

func main() {
    fmt.Println("hello world")
}
mac113344:~ andre$ export PATH=$PATH:/usr/local/go/bin
mac113344:~ andre$ go run a.go
# command-line-arguments
dyld: unknown required load command 0x80000022
